reviewText: it came and the movie has no audio there is no sound

There was an unforeseen problem with the product, which could have been detected before it was sent to me,and I was treated with the utmost courtesy and respect and the problem was handled in a quick and thoughtful way.  I would be willing to order from them again.  I appreciate it when a provider is willing to do what is necessary to fix a problem that was really a fluke.
